com.radiantlogic.iddm.annotations

Annotation Type CustomConnector


  • @Target(value=TYPE)
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Documented
public @interface CustomConnector
    Marks a class that implements a custom data connector for IDDM.

    This annotation identifies classes that provide custom data operations (Create, Search, Modify, Delete) for IDDM integration with external data sources that don't use LDAP or JDBC protocols.

    Requirements:

    • Annotated class must have exactly one constructor
    • Constructor must be 0-args or all parameters must be marked with ManagedComponent or Property annotations.

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      String configuration
      Specifies the path to the JSON configuration file that describes this connector's metadata and schema.

    • Element Detail

      • configuration

        public abstract String configuration
        Specifies the path to the JSON configuration file that describes this connector's metadata and schema.
        Returns:
        The path of a JSON file visible as a resource to this class
